using System;
using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.Formatting.Input
{
	using System.Threading.Tasks;
	public partial class IndentCondition
	{
		public Task TestAsync(string value)
		{
			if (value == null)
				throw new ArgumentNullException(nameof(value));
			return InternalTestAsync();
			async Task InternalTestAsync()
			{

				await (SimpleFile.ReadAsync());
				value = value == "null" ? "test" : value;
				value = value != "test"
					? "val" : value;
				value = value != "test"
					? "val"
					: value;
			}
		}
	}
}
